abstract: Comcast’s Steve Burke, the man who will be charged with integrating NBC Universal into the cable company, received a five-year contract extension.
snippet: Comcast’s Steve Burke, the man who will be charged with integrating NBC Universal into the cable company, received a five-year contract extension.
lead_paragraph: Comcast‘s Steve Burke, the man who will be charged with integrating NBC Universal into the cable company, received a five-year contract extension on Tuesday, according to an SEC filing.

headline.main: Comcast Gives Burke a Contract Extension
